data.message: Nope don't like the advert. The original will always be " holidays are coming" with the Coca Cola truck. U tried to make a new one a few years ago and it didn't go down well. It's a tradition for everyone to see the Coca Cola truck advert on the tv :)

replies.message: I think they use the truck for a few weeks to keep everyone happy, and then put out their new one. I think it's a good compromise and keeps everyone happy. It really isn't Christmas until you've seen the truck and they know how much we all love it! But if they didn't do a new one as well, people would say they are getting boring a stale. As long as I see the truck ad once, I am happy!
